name: Warrior Gaming Lair: Motivation and Achievement Via Gaming
blurb: We hope to increase student achievement and attendance at school by infusing play and gaming strategies into our school.

rewards.reward: Your name, in all its glory, on a plaque in the Warrior Gaming Lair to prove that you helped create this amazing space!

5 Plan Lesson Plan Pack:  A digital copy of 5 Lesson plans for any subject with the video games used in our Gaming Lair.  Lesson plans will be centered around our National Objectives, Common Core Objectives, and our Essential Standards depending on the subject.\r\n\r\nPlease be sure to specify what size shirt you would like for us to airbrush for you.

Warrior Gaming Lair Tshirt\r\nWhat better incentive to back this project than a t-shirt to show how much you love warriors, gamers, and education?!  Our t-shirt will be designed by the winner of our t-shirt design contest hosted in our art department.  All shirts will be airbrushed by our students and supervised by our art teacher.  They will look awesome!

5" x 7" Artwork by our wonderful West Pender art students inspired by video games in our Lair.  Artwork may be in the form of 8bit art or concept art produced by our fabulous middle school art students.\r\n\r\nAnd your name, in all its glory, on a plaque in the Warrior Gaming Lair to prove that you helped create this amazing space!

10 Plan Lesson Plan Pack:  A digital copy of 10 Lesson plans for any subject with the video games used in our Gaming Lair.  Lesson plans will be centered around our National Objectives, Common Core Objectives, and our Essential Standards depending on the subject.

The Gaming Science Pack:  A digital copy of 10 Lesson plans specifically for science with the video games used in our Gaming Lair.  Lesson plans will be centered around our National Objectives, Common Core Objectives, and our Essential Standards.  Geology, Biology, Chemistry, and Physics will be represented in our lesson plan pack and can be adapted for almost any age group.



*************And our Warrior Gaming Lair Tshirt***********

9" x 12" Artwork by our wonderful West Pender art students inspired by video games in our Lair. Artwork may be in the form of 8bit art or concept art produced by our fabulous middle school art students.  Artwork will be matted to fit in an 11" x 14" frame.

And your name, in all its glory, on a plaque in the Warrior Gaming Lair to prove that you helped create this amazing space!

*************And our Warrior Gaming Lair Tshirt***********

16" x 20" Painted artwork by the art teacher at WPMS, Sara Toothman.  Artwork will be inspired by the video games in our Gaming Lair and will be on stretched canvas.

*************AND*************

9 x 12"  Artwork by our wonderful West Pender art students inspired by video games in our Lair. Artwork may be in the form of 8bit art or concept art produced by our fabulous middle school art students. Artwork will be matted to fit in an 11" x 14" frame.

 *************And********************* Your name, in all its glory, on a plaque in the Warrior Gaming Lair to prove that you helped create this amazing space!
